alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 09 at 5:20AM PDT until July 16 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with high temperatures of 105 to 110. * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 8 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay out of the midday sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.
